title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 571/90 of 7 March 1990 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3967/89 fixing, for the 1990 fishing year, the overall foreseeable level of imports for the products to the supplementary trade mechanism in the fisheries sector
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 571/90
of 7 March 1990
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3967/89 fixing, for the 1990 fishing year, the overall foreseeable level of imports for the products to the supplementary trade mechanism in the fisheries sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Part B of the Annex to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3967/89 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1990.
For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 55, 1. 3. 1986, p. 47.
(2) OJ No L 25, 28. 1. 1987, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 385, 30. 12. 1989, p. 30.
(4) See page 12 of this Official Journal.
